preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 138.52 g of Lanthanum Oxide and 56.43 g of Neodymium Oxide using a precision scale.  
 2. Add the measured amounts of Lanthanum Oxide and Neodymium Oxide into a clean ceramic crucible.  
 3. Measure 16.00 g of sulfur and mix it in with the oxides.  
 4. Prepare a separate vessel with approximately 32.00 g of oxygen (use an oxygen concentrator if necessary).  
 5. Mix all components thoroughly until a homogenous powder is formed.
